item.title: The Other Bubble
item.description: No one on the news had any idea how to cover it. Not a single neighborhood reporter or Pulitzer Prize winning journalist. Nor any local, national, or international program. Watching the news anchors try to piece it together was almost funny. As they listened to experts in multiverse theory lay out long-winded analogies, their wrinkled foreheads betrayed the exhausting mental gymnastics unfoldi in their minds. “So, what you’re saying is, the very fabric of our world is being absorbed into theirs?
